headline.main: Decision on New Sports for Tokyo Games Put Off Until 2016

docs.snippet: Despite the fighting that continues on the city’s outskirts, the opera, the circus and the planetarium remain open for people craving entertainment....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite the fighting that continues on the city’s outskirts, the opera, the circus and the planetarium remain open for people craving entertainment.
docs.abstract: Donetsk Journal; arts venues in war-torn city of Donetsk, Ukraine, defiantly remain open as residents seek to distract themselves from ongoing fighting between pro-Russian rebels and Ukrainian military; even with declining attendance, city's opera, circus, theater groups and arts centers, as well as planetarium, maintain regularly scheduled performances.

headline.main: Ukraine City at War’s Edge Clings to Arts
headline.print_headline: Ukraine City at War’s Edge Clings to Arts
